CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 19, 1946, pg. 9, reads: Charming Ceremony - In a charming double ring ceremony, Miss Mary Frances Walker and Theodore E. Stokes were married by the Rev. Charles Foggie, Monday night. in wedding party were Mrs. Earlee Thomas, matron of honor; the bride and groom; James Stokes, best man, and Joshua Walker, father of the bride.  Also shown, rear, left to right; Miss Ruth Young and Shirley Butler, bridesmaids, and Richard Truman, Ollie Matthew, groomsmen; the Rev. Charles Foggie. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, including groom Theodore E. Stokes, bride Mary Frances Walker Stokes, and Joshua Walker second from right, posed in domestic interior with ornate mirror
